revised_title: Development of the Retina and Optic Nerve, and the Membranous Labyrinth and Auditory Nerve
tldr: Henry Gray's study on the development of the retina and optic nerve, as well as the membranous labyrinth and auditory nerve, demonstrates their mode of evolution and the layers they form. The research confirms previous observations on the structure of the retina and provides insights into the origin and development of these essential parts of the human body.
